title: Client keeps Crashing
body:
So this started today, i've been playing and after every game, i get a message saying that the pvp.net client has stopped working, then exits by itself, i am now trying to reopen the client and it doesn't even start up

Edit: i cleared some disk space and that seemed to work, but my disk has been full for quite some time, so unsure how it helped but it did


Help?
